## Install

Uses `fp-ts` as a peer dependency.

```bash
yarn add fp-ts @xmaho/utility-ts
```

or

```bash
npm install fp-ts @xmaho/utility-ts
```

or

```bash
pnpm add fp-ts @xmaho/utility-ts
```

## Example

```ts
import * as XmahoLib from '@xmaho/utility-ts'

// write an example...
```
